A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This might have been the best Star Wars yet.  Both the heroes and villians were layered and complex.  No one was pure good or pure evil.  There were pure character moments\, exciting action\, and some unexpected events.  It treated women and people of color as being as interesting and capable.  I saw the original movie multiple times in theaters when it first came out.  I think I need to repeat that again.
